Package com.cloudera.hoop

Class Summary
AccessTimeParam Class for access-time parameter.
AuthFilter Subclass of Alfredo's AuthenticationFilter that obtains its configuration from Hoop's server configuration.
BlockSizeParam Class for block-size parameter.
DeleteRecursiveParam Class for delete's recursive parameter.
DoAsParam Class for do-as parameter.
FilterParam Class for filter parameter.
FsPathParam Class for path parameter.
GetOpParam Class for GET operation parameter.
GroupParam Class for group parameter.
Hoop Main class of Hoop server.
HoopExceptionProvider JAX-RS ExceptionMapper implementation that maps Hoop's exceptions to HTTP status codes.
HoopFileSystemReleaseFilter Filter that releases Hadoop filesystem instances upon HTTP request completion.
HoopServer Bootstrap class that manages the initialization and destruction of the Hoop server, it is a javax.servlet.ServletContextListener implementation that is wired in Hoop's WAR WEB-INF/web.xml.
LenParam Class for len parameter.
ModifiedTimeParam Class for modified-time parameter.
OffsetParam Class for offset parameter.
OverwriteParam Class for overwrite parameter.
OwnerParam Class for owner parameter.
PermissionParam Class for permission parameter.
PostOpParam Class for POST operation parameter.
PutOpParam Class for PUT operation parameter.
ReplicationParam Class for replication parameter.
ToPathParam Class for to-path parameter.
 

Enum Summary
GetOpParam.Values Get operations.
PostOpParam.Values Post operations.
PutOpParam.Values Put operations.
